text: Raúl León (born 8 March 1970) is a Cuban rower. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Cuba Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Villa Clara Province Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Cuba Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Rowers at the 1995 Pan American Games Category:Rowers at the 1999 Pan American Games
title: Raúl León
